Instruction: Chop the bell peppers, red onion, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and fresh parsley into bite-sized pieces.
In a large bowl,  combine the chopped vegetables.
Crumble feta cheese over the salad.
In a small bowl,  whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to coat.
Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow flavors to meld.
Serve chilled as a refreshing side dish.
